channel.title: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests
channel.description:
[img]http://www.image-maps.com/uploaded_files/9201311111533277_post-1-0-24414400-1384012403.gif[/img]
[center][size=12pt]Fryegard is a newly formed server, wanting players to test out the content![/size][/center]
[left][size=12pt]The features are:[/size][/left] [left][size=12pt]Highscores 4 different game modes to choose from with different XP rates Eco and PvP server Clan Chat system that works over both servers Lots of bosses Rev caves Quests Friendly players Vote4Rewards Soon to have highscore signatures Lots of working skills Custom emotes like ::Yazoo Working ring of wealth Friendly Staff [/size][/left]
[img]http://www.image-maps.com/uploaded_files/9201311111633115_post-1-0-64964500-1384012401.png[/img] [img]http://www.image-maps.com/uploaded_files/9201311111633115_post-1-0-87309500-1384012405.png[/img] [img]http://www.image-maps.com/uploaded_files/9201311111633115_post-1-0-83004700-1384012396.png[/img] [img]http://www.image-maps.com/uploaded_files/9201311111633115_post-1-0-61525900-1384012409.png[/img]
[center][size=14pt]We still want some more ideas, so join now and maybe you can suggest some great ideas! Even if you log on for 5 mins only, we will still want to hear whats good/bad about the server![/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]So please visit us at: [url=http://fryegard.com]http://fryegard.com[/url]/[/size][/center]

item.title: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Your co-owner’s name sounds quite familiar, not sure what it reminds me of though.

Anyway, I wish for the best for the server, the forums seems to be decent (theme is over-used though), and the homepage is simple enough to where it’s fine. I’m not sure about the server, I’m a first-impression sort-of person so I expect the forums to be in tip-top shape before I even bother with the server (could care less about the server actually considering the forums and homepage is the first thing that someone sees which means it’s obviously the first impression).

The one thing I will say about the forums is that I hate the positioning of the boards themselves.

Good luck with the development of the server, I’ll check it out for a couple of minutes.

Read full topic

item.source: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests

item.title: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Faris Mr Faris
item.description:
@Mr_Faris wrote:

Giving this a thumbs up,

I been on the server for like 2 days. I am shocked its on this topic,
I enjoy leveling and bossing, Its nice to have decent players on now and then and staff to keep in contact,

And ofc the highscores to compete,
No one isn’t maxed yet,

Maybe it could be you ;3

4 modes to have a go on,
So enjoy the server like i did!

Thanks for taking your time to read this!
Worth to check and maybe suggest something.
I made so much suggestions to the developers. its nice of them to take their time off to listen to players for suggestions to make the server better.

That is all
See you ingame maybe?
Faris

Read full topic
item.source: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests

item.title: Fryegard! Minigames | Bosses | Eco & PvP | Quests
item.dc:creator: @YazooFryegard YazooFryegard
item.description:
@YazooFryegard wrote:

[center][size=12pt]Fryegard is a newly formed server, wanting players to test out the content![/size][/center]

[left][size=12pt]The features are:[/size][/left]
[left][size=12pt]Highscores
4 different game modes to choose from with different XP rates
Eco and PvP server
Clan Chat system that works over both servers
Lots of bosses
Rev caves
Quests
Friendly players
Vote4Rewards
Soon to have highscore signatures
Lots of working skills
Custom emotes like ::Yazoo
Working ring of wealth
Friendly Staff
[/size][/left]




[center][size=14pt]We still want some more ideas, so join now and maybe you can suggest some great ideas! Even if you log on for 5 mins only, we will still want to hear whats good/bad about the server![/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]So please visit us at: http://fryegard.com/[/size][/center]
